title: Emily Ratajkowski better have couch covers as she lounges naked on lazy Monday
text:
Mondays are low and lazy in the Ratajkowski household (Picture: Emily Ratajkowski)

Emily Ratajkowski showed us Mondays in her house calls for no clothes, as she enjoyed a naked coffee drinking moment.

The model took to social media to show us all there was no shame in letting it all hang out, as she chilled out with her husband.

Perched on her couch, Emily looked right at home as she covered her boobs and rested a cup in her crotch.

Hold up, is that the best place for a piping hot beverage, Em? Probably the worst moment for her to spill her coffee, tbh…

She captioned the shot: ‘Mornings at home.’

Don’t spill the coffee! (Picture: @emrata)

Everyone was getting into the spirit (Picture: @emrata)

Not the kind of mornings at our home. We WISH we were this chilled about the upholstery.

Naked caffeine wasn’t the only thing running in the Ratajkowski household, as the 28-year-old hung out with her husband Sebastian Bear-McClard, 32, and their adorable dog.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Seems the model, designer and actress was keen to shed her clothes after revealing on Instagram she’d been wearing the same trackpants suit for 24 hours after travelling back to their swanky manor.

We can totally relate. Mind you, those tracksuits probably cost more than our most glamorous outfit…

Emily with husband Sebastian (Picture: Invision)

The star is often praised for unapologetically living her best life and getting her kit off as she sees fit.

Hear hear!

Earlier this year she admitted she used to be ‘ashamed’ of her body, after hitting puberty a little earlier than her schoolmates.

Now? It’s evident she DGAF what people think and proudly does her thing.

Including naked Mondays.

‘I’m really about body positivity, for me I grew up and I developed super young. I was criticised at 13,’ she explained in June.

‘I felt really ashamed of my body but I’ve come full circle, and now I’m like, “Do your thing!” I really want young girls to see that and feel that way about themselves.’

Knowing her nekkid posts garner a whole lot of attention, negative and positive, Emily previously shared her thoughts on having inner confidence alongside Kourtney Kardashian.

She explained: ‘[When I post nude pictures on Instagram] the initial reaction is, “Oh my god, naked again” or “She’s so stupid” and “Do you have nothing else to offer?”

‘But actually, I’m running a business out of this. It’s about personal branding.’

She added on Poosh.com: ‘I love the idea of white, older men in suits saying they don’t take me seriously [in business] while I make more money than them.’
